15// DESCRIPTION:
16// Functions and definitions relating to the game type and operational
17// mode.
18//
19
20#ifndef __D_MODE__
21#define __D_MODE__
22
23#include "doomtype.h"
24
25// The "mission" controls what game we are playing.
26
27typedef enum
28{
29 doom, // Doom 1
30 doom2, // Doom 2
31 pack_tnt, // Final Doom: TNT: Evilution
32 pack_plut, // Final Doom: The Plutonia Experiment
33 pack_chex, // Chex Quest (modded doom)
34 pack_hacx, // Hacx (modded doom2)
35 heretic, // Heretic
36 hexen, // Hexen
37 strife, // Strife
38 doom2f, // Doom 2: L'Enfer sur Terre
39 pack_nerve, // Doom 2: No Rest For The Living
40 pack_master, // Master Levels for Doom 2
41
42 none
43} GameMission_t;
44
45// The "mode" allows more accurate specification of the game mode we are
46// in: eg. shareware vs. registered. So doom1.wad and doom.wad are the
47// same mission, but a different mode.
48
49typedef enum
50{
51 shareware, // Doom/Heretic shareware
52 registered, // Doom/Heretic registered
53 commercial, // Doom II/Hexen
54 retail, // Ultimate Doom
55 indetermined // Unknown.
56} GameMode_t;
57
58// What version are we emulating?
59
60typedef enum
61{
62 exe_doom_1_2, // Doom 1.2: shareware and registered
63 exe_doom_1_666, // Doom 1.666: for shareware, registered and commercial
64 exe_doom_1_7, // Doom 1.7/1.7a: "
65 exe_doom_1_8, // Doom 1.8: "
66 exe_doom_1_9, // Doom 1.9: "
67 exe_hacx, // Hacx
68 exe_ultimate, // Ultimate Doom (retail)
69 exe_final, // Final Doom
70 exe_final2, // Final Doom (alternate exe)
71 exe_chex, // Chex Quest executable (based on Final Doom)
72
73 exe_heretic_1_3, // Heretic 1.3
74
75 exe_hexen_1_1, // Hexen 1.1
76 exe_strife_1_2, // Strife v1.2
77 exe_strife_1_31 // Strife v1.31
78} GameVersion_t;
79
80// What IWAD variant are we using?
81
82typedef enum
83{
84 vanilla, // Vanilla Doom
85 freedoom, // FreeDoom: Phase 1 + 2
86 freedm, // FreeDM
87 bfgedition, // Doom Classic (Doom 3: BFG Edition)
88} GameVariant_t;
89
90// Skill level.
91
92typedef enum
93{
94 sk_noitems = -1, // the "-skill 0" hack
95 sk_baby = 0,
96 sk_easy,
97 sk_medium,
98 sk_hard,
99 sk_nightmare
100} skill_t;
101
102boolean D_ValidGameMode(GameMission_t mission, GameMode_t mode);
103boolean D_ValidGameVersion(GameMission_t mission, GameVersion_t version);
104boolean D_ValidEpisodeMap(GameMission_t mission, GameMode_t mode, int episode, int map);
105int D_GetNumEpisodes(GameMission_t mission, GameMode_t mode);
106boolean D_IsEpisodeMap(GameMission_t mission);
107const char *D_GameMissionString(GameMission_t mission);
108const char *D_GameModeString(GameMode_t mode);
109
110#endif /* #ifndef __D_MODE__ */
